text: læa t̄ĥā cêā t̄hām phwk k̄heā ẁā khır lèā thrng h̄lạ̀ng n̂ảlng mā cāk fāk f̂ā læ̂w thrng h̄ı̂ p̄hæ̀ndin mī chīwitchīwā h̄lạngcāk khwām h̄æ̂nglæ̂ng k̄hxng mạn næ̀nxn phwk k̄heā ca kl̀āw ẁā xạllxḥ̒ cng kl̀āw t̄heid (muḥạmmạd) brrdā kār s̄rrs̄eriỵ pĕn s̄ithṭhi̒ k̄hx ngxạllxḥ̒ tæ̀ẁā s̄̀wn māk phwk k̄heā mị̀ chı̂ s̄tipạỵỵā khır̀khrwỵ
